text: Oskar Kwiatkowski (born 25 April 1996) is a Polish snowboarder. He competed in the 2017 FIS Snowboard World Championships, and in the 2018 Winter Olympics, in parallel giant slalom. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male snowboarders Category:Olympic snowboarders of Poland Category:Snowboarders at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Zakopane Category:Universiade gold medalists for Poland Category:Universiade medalists in snowboarding Category:Competitors at the 2019 Winter Universiade
title: Oskar Kwiatkowski
